            IF(_xlpm.lu_lookup&lt;&gt;0,
                _xlpm.lu_lookup,
                "Please fill in LU Title in the Curriculum Structure Table in tab '3 - Instructional Design'"
            )
        )

        _xlfn.TEXTJOIN(CHAR(10), TRUE,
            IF(checks!G:G = '3 - Summary'!$B10,
                checks!H:H &amp; ": " &amp; checks!I:I &amp;
                IF(checks!J:J = "",
                    IF(course_type &lt;&gt; NWSQ, " (Please select K&amp;As for this LO in tab '3 - Instructional Design')", ""),
                    IF(course_type = NWSQ, "", " (" &amp; checks!J:J &amp; ")")

                _xlfn._xlws.FILTER(

                checks!H:H &amp; ": " &amp; checks!I:I &amp;
                IF(checks!J:J = "",
                    IF(course_type &lt;&gt; NWSQ, " (Please select K&amp;As for this LO in tab '3 - Instructional Design')", ""),

                checks!H:H &amp; ": " &amp; checks!I:I &amp;
                IF(checks!J:J = "",

                    IF(course_type = NWSQ, "", " (" &amp; checks!J:J &amp; ")")
                ),
                ""
            )
        ),
        "Please add the learning outcomes in tab '3 - Instructional Design'"
    )

            IF(checks!G:G = '3 - Summary'!$B101,
                checks!H:H &amp; ": " &amp; checks!I:I &amp;
                IF(checks!J:J = "",
                    IF(course_type &lt;&gt; NWSQ, " (Please select K&amp;As for this LO in tab '3 - Instructional Design')", ""),

                _xlfn._xlws.FILTER(

        IF(course_type=NWSQ,
            IF(ISERROR(_xlpm.nwsq_sum),
                "Please check the duration column in the Lesson Plan Table in tab '3 - Instructional Design'",

                    IF(course_type &lt;&gt; NWSQ, " (Please select K&amp;As for this LO in tab '3 - Instructional Design')", ""),
